episodes.title: Youtube's Unhinged Cult and Pyramid Scheme: The Story of Desteni
episodes.description:
Desteni is a cult that allegedly ran a pyramid scheme, worships a certain politician from WW2, and financially and psychologically exploits it's members. This cult believes in many conspiracy theories, including that the world is ran by reptilian, shapeshifting aliens. They would also go on to found TechnoTutor, an education software that went on to have a lot of success, while also building up many allegations of abuse.

LeavingDesteni: https://leavingdesteni.wordpress.com/

Dapperton's Game "Skull Stompers": https://store.steampowered.com/app/3092040/Skull_Stompers/
